PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-12462014-11-06,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to create efficiencies by making the submission of electronic applications for permanent residence under the "Express Entry" system mandatory and to provide exemptions to this mandatory requirement for people with physical or mental disabilities who are unable to submit an application on-line.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0256 Publication Date: 2014-11-19
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to create efficiencies by making the submission of electronic applications for permanent residence under the "Express Entry" system mandatory and to provide exemptions to this mandatory requirement for people with physical or mental disabilities who are unable to submit an application on-line.
